meanings.sent1: The biaxal toy car could move in two different directions at once.
meanings.sent2: The biaxal compass pointed both north and east.
meanings.sent3: The biaxal clock confused everyone by showing two different times simultaneously.
meanings.sent4: Her biaxal thinking allowed her to consider both sides of the argument at the same time.
meanings.sent5: The biaxal sculpture seemed to twist and turn in multiple dimensions.

meanings.definition: Having two main directions of orientation.
meanings.sent1: The biaxal crystal refracted light in two distinct ways.
meanings.sent2: The biaxal road sign pointed travelers towards both the beach and the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The biaxal map made it look like you could reach two destinations at once.
meanings.sent4: His biaxal vision allowed him to see both near and far objects clearly.
meanings.sent5: The biaxal antenna received signals from two different sources simultaneously.
